Html:
Hi, i test the phpword, it's work but i have a question, it's possible when we make the word document to save as in my desktop and not in the server?

thanks

lo que yo he echo es esto

Guardo en una carpeta del servidor
$objWriter = PHPWord_IOFactory::createWriter($PHPWord, 'Word2007');
$objWriter->save('Ruta_carpeta_escribible/temp/Text.docx');

y doy un link pra que lo puedan descargar

echo '<a href="Ruta_carpeta_escribible/temp/Text.docx">descargar</a>';
